Package com.ms.gradle.application

Interface ApplicationSpec

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Application, ApplicationJar
    public interface ApplicationSpec
    A specification for building a runnable JAR.
    See Also:
    Application, ApplicationJar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      Returns the project that this ApplicationSpec belongs to.

      • fromSourceSet

        default void fromSourceSet​(@Nullable
                           SourceSet sourceSet)

        Configures the application to build from a SourceSet.

        Calling this method is equivalent to setting the following properties:

        • rawJar = locateRawJar(SourceSet)
        • dependencies = locateDependencies(SourceSet)
        Parameters:
        sourceSet - The SourceSet to build the application from.
        See Also:
        fromSourceSet(Provider)

      • fromSourceSet

        default void fromSourceSet​(@Nonnull
                           Provider<SourceSet> sourceSet)

        Configures the application to build from a SourceSet.

        Calling this method is equivalent to setting the following properties:

        • rawJar = locateRawJar(Provider)
        • dependencies = locateDependencies(Provider)
        Parameters:
        sourceSet - The SourceSet to build the application from.
        See Also:
        fromSourceSet(SourceSet)

      • getRawJar

        @InputFiles
@PathSensitive(NONE)
@Optional
@Nonnull
Property<Jar> getRawJar()
        Jar task whose output to enhance with the application's classpath and main class metadata.
        Returns:
        Property object specifying the application's raw JAR.
        See Also:
        locateRawJar(SourceSet), fromSourceSet(SourceSet), fromSourceSet(Provider)

      • getDependencies

        @Classpath
@Optional
@Nonnull
Property<Configuration> getDependencies()
        Configuration to resolve the application's dependencies from. The application's classpath will consist of the resolved dependency artifact files.
        Returns:
        Property object specifying the application's dependencies.
        See Also:
        locateDependencies(SourceSet), fromSourceSet(SourceSet), fromSourceSet(Provider)

      • getDependencyDirectoryName

        @Input
@Nonnull
Property<String> getDependencyDirectoryName()
        Name of the directory that will contain the application's dependencies.
        Returns:
        Property object specifying the application's dependency directory name.

      • getMainClass

        @Input
@Nonnull
Property<String> getMainClass()
        The fully qualified name of the application's main class.
        Returns:
        Property object specifying the application's main class.
